description:
A comfy pocket tee that you can feel good about. Part of Patagonia’s Responsibili-Tee® line that is made from recycled bottles and scrap fabrics. This repurposing of materials reduces water use during manufacturing and keeps stuff out of the world's landfills and incinerators.

  • Made using 118g of recycled scrap fabric and 4.8 recycled plastic bottles
  • Recycling process uses 96% less water and creates 45% less CO2 per unit than conventional cotton T-shirt production
  • Taped shoulder seams for comfort and fit retention
  • Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free
  • Patagonia original art
  • Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
name: Patagonia Ridge Rise Stripe Pocket Responsibili-Tee - Women's
